title: Valance, late 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: silk and velvet appliqué
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Keith Kane from the Estate of Mrs. Robert B. Noyes
description: Horizontal panel with scallops at the lower edge. Green velvet with appliquéd ornament in the design of conventionalized flowers in blue, red, yellow and white.
